review: its good

i am not usually into side scrolling hack and slash games with the exception of rare gems like dead cells and dustan elysian tail but i am enjoying this game even though i am not great at it on normal difficulty a lot of people comment on the wanting to turn off the narrator maybe its because it is my first play through but i am loving the commentary and find a lot of it amusing especially the easter eggs you can find
good but very short game buy when its on the sale  graphics 810 soundtrack 910 story 410 too short gameplay 810 overall 72510

coming back just to say that this game is probably one of the best short games it carries an insane amount of charm interesting story elements and lore to piece together and comedic bits to really keep you exploring the game play is also very fluid not a hard game by any means but it has such a cool aesthetic and the bosses really do feel like bosses
cuc hnh trnh hp dn ca icey v ngi dn chuyn i qua th gii my mc y hp dn
nc game worth the money
pls add the option to mute the narrator the voice is annoying asf
not a fan of the combat with inconsistent telegraphs
its also a comedy game the fruits of your ragebait are best experienced in chinese or japanese dub regardless of fluency
even tho i play icey 1 year after release and play again today i just realized the real villain in this game is actually the narrator damn he yapping all the time
cute game cool fun lil side scroller

i remember playing this back in 2016 when i played it on mobile coming back to this and getting the achievement i enjoy the combat and the narrator driving him nuts when youre doing the opposite its not too hard or easy but enjoyable for all i would recommend this

very cool game the story is very interesting and unique and i really liked the gameplay for the most part some of the bosses are very frustrating to play against and despite still beating them relatively fast i was usually very annoyed by them idk if i was on easy mode or not i might just have a skill issue  but yeah 1010 story solid gameplay arguably one of the best games ive ever played if i was good would definitely recommend buying
first game i ever 100 great game
can only be beaten by people who have even a modicum of skill and not by the ones who push every button to compensate for the lack of
highly recommended for people who likes to pick a fight
short game that easy to get all the achievements it was quite interactive with player because the narrator love to break the 4th wall

although a short game i very much enjoyed the experience the combat was easy to learn and the moments between you and the narrator were fun the soundtrack was also very good  although i dont really understand the overall meaning behind the story i still enjoyed the perspective the narrator gave when it came to a developers pov trying to this game  my only complaint are that sometimes you need to spam the enter button to be able to interact the shop  i give this an 810
nice
hatsune miku
it was a fun game different kind of concept that i enjoyed wasnt to hard or overly easy 8510

its just annoying to play you gotta wait for the narrator to get pissed off at you for not following his orders and that means not playing the game for minutes for each secret literally just standing around doing nothing  no flow in the combat either enemies overlap and stun lock you to death this means that you can get clipped by an enemy that you couldnt even see  i guess i could just get good but to be honest this game is not fun enough for me to put that effort
is a reallyreally fun gameits really worth getting intol hope you all have fun with meta gameand its a good meta game
great game i enjoyed it way more than i expected it is really fun to frick around in this game
fantastic art style and very tight gameplay
game nearly broke my mind beyond repair but i still quite enjoyed the ride

definitely worth more than 5x the price this game was a fantastic fourth wall breaking experience and a great joy to play 9510 sometimes its finicky to enter rooms or to activate the upgrade bot thats literally my only problem everything else is peak

amazing game i learned to always move in opposite direction from what someone suggests i wish there was a harder difficulty than hard since i thought it was an intended difficulty  if you plan on playing this game i highly recommend the japanese voice its a lot more expressive than english dub
really cute hack and slash loved the humor and its pretty challenging considering its length i would recommend doing all of the achievements of this game for the complete experience
its cool
i need more of icey
very brave to make a game that leans so hard on metanarrative when the core gameplay is so mushy in this case it does not work
enemies stun lock you save points are rare the story writing and narration are cringe and the control scheme is ass like who tf thought b to accept and a to go back was a good idea
bardzo przyjemny slashermettroidvania na jeden wieczr
looks pretty cool thats it
1010 arte
narrator asked me to put a good review
the game left me wanting more and i dont entirelly get the plot but overall i reccomend this game

rather challenging sidescroller with a story youre told but never sure is the real one the multitude of different endings is a plus one of which i got on total accident art design is amazing and really put you into that postapocalyptic mind set you be asking yourself what happened here how did it get like this am i doing the right thing the whole time
for me its short but sick game
hard but i like it

stressing the narrator out the game release your inner brat in the most acceptable way  anything and everything the narrator told me to do i didnt even when forced without a choice i waited  this is much more hilarious than i ever thought itd be while the game is short i can see one can milk plenty of hours out of this by exploring different ways to try to get the narrator to kill themselves
short but fun game just what i was looking for good combat and enjoyable story
fun game

went into this very excited about getting a stanley parablelike narrative about the nature of video game storytelling instead i get lectured about how hard it is to make games and getting locked in rooms for disobeying the all mighty developer
there isnt even an option to turn off the narrator insufferable
really good and fun
fun but rather short gameplay time i just wish it has more content
if you like this game you have to play the stanley parable i mean it go get it now
metal gear rising revengeance and the stanley parable had a child and it was great

outstanding visuals and the combat honestly feels very good however the game is very short is what i thought at first but achievement hunting gives it a few more hours of playtime which i heavily recommend
its fun ignoring the narrator and listening to him get mad as you do your own thing
average hackslash the meta commentary made it better
the combat is the deal breaker so many enemies have grab attacks hitboxes are unpredictable stunlocks are constant and drawn out

this game left me with so many questions and not a single one is answered it is too short and not linear enough to warrant going back to replaying it and figuring out the lore i dont get the meta commentary aspect and the narrator is just very annoying the combat was satisfying but not engaging i got to burn through enemies without ever thinking about the buttons i was pressing
the stanley parable if it was actually good
i want to love it but the cutscene  dialogue before boss fight is a bum why not update a skippable button
love the art love the style  love the story love the game play love the achievements fun game to play if you want to kill some time
interesting combination of 2d god of war anime and stanley parable yes that stanley parable

one of those games that comes with little to no expectations and turns out to be incredibly enjoyable is this a masterpiece sadly no but everything in its way works together like a clockwork to deliver a very entertaining playing experience graphics is quite nice gameplay is funny narrative is very amusing i wouldnt buy at full price but on sale is definitively a bargain  i will definitively check for other works from this indie dev
short but fun

despite not having a bajillion hours and having not played it in probably half a decade icey is a game i still hold very fond its art is beautiful and its storytelling narrative is very interesting youre able to replay it over and over so many times to go down different routes and paths i love it so much i wish it was longer
pretty good

from start to finish it took me about 2 hours i didnt finish everything and i didnt explore everything fascinating nonetheless i personally like the combat style a lot though in the beginning i had my issues but i quickly got used to it and i even just realized now that i finished this game without dying in any case i definetly enjoyed the game especially the art and combat style overall i recommend it i forgot to mention how great the music was and how perfectly it fit
fast paced combat  humorous and 4th wall breaking galore
i will never regret buying this game
i still dont know what this game is about
red fly laser things hit tooo hard feels broken spam and too hard to hit back just annoying distraction for the main fight

i loved the layout and mechanics of the game as well as the visual elements and styling it blends a mixture of future and present to help guide me on my journey through the icey world the difficulty means you will be playing for a while and honestly after my mmorpg addiction and its end i dare say it was worth the effort i did have to look a few fights up but that was more to do with time constraints than anything else  id say it plays like a futuristic cuphead  a sidescroller

used a guide to help get some achievements for 100 but overall its a great game great combos and music and i enjoyed the meta aspect the narrarator sometimes i didnt like the way they read some lines but i enjoyed them for most of the game  looking forward to the sequel
the easiest case to make for subs over dubs

the narrator meta game will decide if you like this game you will either drive to find more interactions and secrets or it will not captivate you to go beyond the prescribed trail the combat is not enough to win someone over   i enjoyed my time but not enough to run it back to find all the interactions

the hackandslash action aspect of the game doesnt feel particularly fun or varied and the 4th wall breaking meta narratives are not interesting and come out to be more annoying than anything  its very short no real replay value the dodging never feels right and the later bosses are a boring and repetitive hit and run away this is probably not the anime style 2d hs youre looking for
really great short game can recommend fantablade did a great job its fun
surprisingly wellmade fun hack  slash game with emphasis on a 3 wall breaking narration soundtrack is nice too
spam x to win
great short game if i was going to describe it to a friend it would be a 2d sidescroller with stanley parable elements

this is a hack and slash game where you have a narrator you can listen to and follow or completely ignore and explore the narrator will get upset and thats the source of the humour humour is subjective and while i dont think it will hit with most people the game is still engaging enough for its 10 hour runtime also it only costs 14 canadian so you get enough bang for your buck
needs hotter characters

the game brilliantly shatters the fourth wall with its clever humor and witty insights movement can feel a bit janky at times additionally the key binding ui is frustrating as it doesnt update the ingame prompts for some actions aside from that theres really nothing else to complain about
this game juggles you too much one enemy hits you and youre done infinite juggling shit checkpoints feel like an eternity on the runback
top notch  but short
its fun

a very fun short game took me 4 hours to 100
